title: The Birth of Israel (2008) [ DVBC | MVGroup ]
description:
The Birth of Israel


<a href="http://img504.imageshack.us/img504/6692/thebirthofisraelcoverca2.jpg">Titleshot</a>


Information
------------------------------
Jeremy Bowen presents a look back at the creation of the state of Israel, examining the the events leading up to the Israeli war of Independence in 1949, its impact on Arab/Israeli relations and the implications for the Middle East.

This discription doesn&#039;t do this documentary justice. It&#039;s a one hour crash course in some of the underlying causes of the current problems in the Middle East.

see the further links for much deeper background information, and also a link to a site that disagrees with pretty much anything this documentary shows. Never mind some points they raise were nowhere implied as they seem to infer they were. It&#039;s inevitable in this conflict.
